system.description:
Said to have been born from the union of man and fiend, or from a cursed bloodline, Fiendkin often find themselves outcasts in society. Yet, they embody determination in the face of adversity. Their ancestors didnâ€™t emerge from the depths of the Everflame to succumb to minor setbacks!
